package.name: omniscape
package.description: Omni-directional habitat connectivity based on circuit theory

onlineLibrary.name: omniscape-example
onlineLibrary.description: Example library for omniscape that calculates and classifies habitat connectivity in Maryland, USA

onlineLibrary.name: omniscapeImpact-example
onlineLibrary.description: Example library for omniscapeImpact that compares changes in habitat connectivity in Maryland, USA
